main.name: Dilshad Raza
main.description: I analyze and explore Earth and Environmental data from data sources including Wells, field studies, and field surveys
main.bio: I am a Tech Enthusiast with the main domain of interest in Geosciences. I enjoy studying geology, as a matter of fact, it makes me feel great. Earth is my playground, and I love investigating its features. Besides, Geology, I am proficient in Python programming, Git for version control, Jupyter, and Javascript. I love working with data, as data can provide beautiful insights that can be used to take accurate decisions. Artificial Intelligence is the future, so building my skills in this regard. Within subdomains of AI, Machine Learning and Deep Learning are the most exciting ones.
